trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> objects in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為在關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> 控制項中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 物件，提供元件編輯器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> elements of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> objects in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control at design time, under the control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>類別會提供使用者介面編輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>中相關聯的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項在受控制的設計階段<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>物件。

trans-unit.source: There is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> associated with each of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 沒有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>的每個相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> objects are used to apply styles to menu items that depend on their level (nesting depth) in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>物件用來將樣式套用至取決於其層級 （巢狀結構深度） 功能表結構中的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> is invoked, for example, by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelMenuItemStyles** or **LevelSelectedStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>叫用時，例如，藉由選取省略符號按鈕 (**...**) 上**LevelMenuItemStyles**或**LevelSelectedStyles**中的資料列**屬性**的視覺化設計工具的格線。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>方法一律會傳回`false`以指出可以選取該只有一個物件，在編輯器中，一次。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> method creates a new form to display and edit the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>方法會建立新表單以顯示和編輯目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>方法會建立指定之集合的項目類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>方法會傳回編輯器可以建立之型別的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> and <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> classes (the collection editor base class) with a property in a custom control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class, that gets and sets a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>屬性產生關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>和<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>類別 （集合編輯器基底類別） 的內容中自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>類別，取得和設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the collection to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯之集合的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> class when you select, for example, the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelMenuItemStyles** or **LevelSelectedStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control or a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>類別選取時，例如，省略符號按鈕 (**...**) 上**LevelMenuItemStyles**或**LevelSelectedStyles**中的資料列**屬性**方格的視覺化設計工具設計時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項或衍生自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multiple <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> elements can be selected in the editor at one time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示在編輯器中是否可同時選取多個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>方法一律會傳回`false`; 因此，只有一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>中一次，可以選取物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new form to display and edit the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立要顯示和編輯目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> 物件的新表單。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm" /> to use as the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm" /> 的執行個體，當做 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor" /> 使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> base method to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> form, and then formats a caption for the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>基底方法，以建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>表單，然後再設定格式表單的標題。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of item to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立項目的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定集合項目型別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified type, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定型別 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method is used to create new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>方法用來建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> calls the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method to access the activation methods for late-bound support.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>方法來存取晚期繫結支援的啟用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data types that this collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個集合編輯器可建立的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor" /> can create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor" /> 可建立的資料型別之型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> object can create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> type objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>物件可以建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>型別物件。
